alert.note: Alert for Eastern Hampden (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 4:06PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Windham, northeastern Tolland and southeastern Hampden Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 406 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Stafford, or 10 miles east of Enfield, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mansfield, East Longmeadow, Ellington, Tolland, Wilbraham, Stafford, Somers, Monson, Woodstock, Willington, Hampden, Ashford, Pomfret, Holland, Chaplin, Wales, Eastford and Union. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.
